content:
You can attach a few files for test decryption by packing them into an archive with zip, rar, tar, 7zip, 7z, tar.gz extensions of no more than 10 megabytes using the attach button directly in the chat.

If your archive weighs more than 10 megabytes, please use our file sharing service.
http://lockbitfss2w7co3ij6am6wox4xcurtgwukunx3yubcoe5cbxiqakxqd.onion
http://lockbitfsvf75glg226he5inkfgtuoakt4vgfhd7nfgghx5kwz5zo3ad.onion
http://lockbitfskq2fxclyfrop5yizyxpzu65w7pphsgthawcyb4gd27x62id.onion
For security reasons we do not click on other links you send in chat.
Please wait for a reply, sometimes it takes several hours due to possible time zone differences.
Good day. It is not necessary to test with a file. We trust you. We made a security mistake. Please tell us how we proceed so we can recover all the information.

If your archive weighs more than 10 megabytes, please use our file sharing service.
http://lockbitfss2w7co3ij6am6wox4xcurtgwukunx3yubcoe5cbxiqakxqd.onion
http://lockbitfsvf75glg226he5inkfgtuoakt4vgfhd7nfgghx5kwz5zo3ad.onion
http://lockbitfskq2fxclyfrop5yizyxpzu65w7pphsgthawcyb4gd27x62id.onion

Your network was penetrated, servers were completely encrypted with our special algorithm, and also we has downloaded sensitive Data from your file servers. In case if you won't cooperate with us, then everything would be published and/or sold.
We also found a lot of contact information of your employees, clients, partners, etc. In case of your refusal to cooperate, we will try to convey information about the leak of your data to each of these contacts.

We offer you to make a deal and resolve this issue smoothly, all encrypted files will be restored, you will avoid Data Leaks and we will provide you a proofs of deleting all your data from our server. The total weight of the files we have is approximately ~35 gigabytes.
Price for all these services is $50,000 USD, it should be paid in cryptocurrency equivalent.
- To prove that our Decryption tool works properly we can decrypt few random files for FREE, just send them to us
- As a proof of data possession we can provide a partial file-tree of downloaded data (usually about 5-7% of total volume)

You should also know that the files that were downloaded from you were carefully selected. These are not random files, but the most important ones in our opinion.

Ok, we have already sent the requested file.
Unfortunately we do not have that figure. We are willing to pay but we cannot get close to that number.
I am the company's IT technician and I will be responsible for the cost. My job is at risk. Just decrypting the backups would be of great help.
MDF it,s important file DB, will decrypted only after payment, give me any not important files for free test decrypt
The price that was requested was formed based on the indicators of your company. And this price is individual for you. In fact, we very rarely take such low amounts.

The files I received are fine. Thank you.
Now I need an alternative because I can't afford that price.
Right now I have $1500

We understand that you are just a small IT company, or even a simple system administrator, and therefore this amount is large for you.
You need to contact the management of the affected company and inform them about what happened.
Your $ 1,500 will not help the situation in any way. You can keep this money for yourself.
I understand, but I need to fix the problem. The company management holds me responsible and I have to clean up the mess. I really have a lot at stake, I can get to $2100.

The price is really 50,000 dollars. What you offer has no value for us. If we do not come to an agreement with you soon, then soon all the sensitive data that we downloaded from the company servers will be sold and/or published.
As I told you, for me and the company it is impossible to reach that cost. I need us to negotiate. I am willing to pay them. But it has to be a smaller amount. I think that way we all win. Thank you.

We are not ready to lower the price because the price you proposed is too far from reality. Maybe we could discuss with our management a discount of 5-10%, but definitely not 96% as you are asking.
Let me know if a small discount will help you, and we will discuss with our management, and we will move on.
Otherwise, our negotiations have reached a dead end.
thank you. But I don't really get that much money. Please I need your help, I am facing a legal problem because of this. By borrowing more money, I can get $3200
We have already written you all the necessary information.
We will not accept even 10 or 20 thousand dollars. So please do not waste our time and yours.

I understand your position and I understand my position. The company's information is only relevant to the company. These are sales and purchase figures. It is not a production company with important information. Its suppliers and customers are the same as everyone else in its market. It is a salesroom. Its figures are public and accessible to anyone through the various agencies. Currently, you only have to reconstruct it by typing in the data. That is why you hold me responsible and I would be losing my job and you would be losing any possibility of collecting anything. I am receiving support from friends and I can raise $7,000, which I will have to repay.
Please read carefully what we wrote to you earlier.
I read. But its impossible to me. Thats why I´m still beggin you
It doesn't matter to us. Soon all the stolen files will be published. Be prepared for it. You have only one way to prevent it - find the necessary amount of money.

We don't mind the information being published. You can do it without problem. It's not sensitive at all. In our country, financial information is public. We just need to go into production. I repeat, publish or sell what you want.
ok
Good morning. To get back to this, we can offer you $22,000.
The price is 50,000 dollars.
Please I need to solve it for less than, $30,000?
No
The price is 50,000 dollars.
Hi, I'm doing my best to get to that price, but any discount would help me a lot, remember that I'm doing this on my own.
Hello?
Sorry, I could get $40,000 by Monday.
You are a company that helps the affected company solve this problem. Is that correct?
Yes, but they are holding me responsible.

We would like to contact you in a private chat, where we will be alone to discuss all the details. There may be strangers in this chat.
Let me know when you are online, and I will explain to you how it works.
Good morning. I'm online.
online now?
yes
ready get instructions?
yes

Private ID for chat: E8CE7416FADFBF2998576A6DA6B39B90
